rules_text: Surveil 2, then create a Junk token. You lose 1 life. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The Lacy Gang had no idea what, or who, was on the train. But they figured if it was worth hauling in reinforced steel, it was worth robbing.[/i]
